channel.title: DeltaScape Help
channel.description:
Alright so, I want too start coding from Delta_'s clean DeltaScape source.
I downloaded It and pressed run and It run's but like 3 seconds later The CMD box for the run spamms "null" again and again, and you can't log In.
How do I fix this?
This Is the run.bat code:
[code] @echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
That's the regular DeltaScape source run.bat code.. what's wrong?

item.title: DeltaScape Help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Lol, it won’t crash your computer. It simply lags the server and usually doesn’t let people connect. Just search the Download Section, I know there is a DeltaScape Source download by Digital Hotdogs that has anti-leech removed.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

u can run it it will just crash ur computer… Ask urself if its worth it i guess…

Alright so, I want too start coding from Delta_'s clean DeltaScape source.

I downloaded It and pressed run and It run’s but like 3 seconds later The CMD box for the run spamms “null” again and again, and you can’t log In.

That’s the regular DeltaScape source run.bat code… what’s wrong?
